name: Fall Kart
description:
Welcome to the craziest micro drag race through the most dangerous obstacle course! Can you make it through all four trials within the time limit? you be the judge and grab a hold of the wheel!

------------------------------------Controls-----------------------------------------------------

W/ Up Arrow Key    -       Accelerate
S/ Down Arrow Key  -        Reverse
A/ Left Arrow Key    -     Steer Left
D/ Right Arrow Key   -    Steer Right
        Spacebar        -             Jump
               R               -         Reset Game
